column1: Baby Barnaby's////Baby Barnaby's is my favorite place to get breakfast / brunch.  No matter what I order I make sure to get the potatoes as a side
column2: which are always perfectly fried and crispy
column3: never soft.  The Green Eggs is a winner
column4: although I will note they are hella buttery and honestly I feel kinda sleepy / crappy afterwards each time I get em.  But I continue to order the Green Eggs because they're that good!  The biscuits are great too
column5: and they have just the right amount of honey on them.  And finally....APPLE SAUSAGE FTW ALL DAY!!!!!
